    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Print {
            print: Span(
                1,
                7,
            ),
            value: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            13,
                        ),
                        name: "$foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                17,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
